data.prayer: Father, look after and teach the way that is best for the 16,205 believers living in Mazowieckie, Poland.
data.verse: I will instruct you and teach you in the way you should go. I will counsel you with my loving eye on you.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Mazowieckie, Poland
data.section_summary: What challenges do people here face?

data.prayer: Spirit, help the disciples in the state of Mazowieckie to find a person of peace today, like the Philippian jailer, who heard and was immediately baptized with his whole family.
data.verse: And they spoke the word of the Lord to him and to all who were in his house. And he took them the same hour of the night and washed their wounds; and he was baptized at once, he and all his family.

data.prayer: Father, your Word can be a lamp to the feet of the 4,657,309 people in the state of Mazowieckie who claim to know you, if they open it and read it today.
data.verse: your Word is a lamp to my feet and a light to my path.

data.prayer: Father, knowing that teachers will be judged more strictly, help the local leaders in Mazowieckie, Poland to be careful with their words.
data.verse: Not many of you should become teachers, my brothers, for you know that we who teach will be judged with greater strictness.

data.prayer: Spirit, I pray that the Tatar people will come and worship before you, Lord. May they glorify your name for you are great.
Spirit, encourage every believer in Mazowieckie, Poland to do the work of an evangelist with their friends and neighbors.
data.verse: But you, keep your head in all situations, endure hardship, do the work of an evangelist

data.prayer: Father, let the threatened of Mazowieckie, Poland know that it is better to trust in you than to trust in humans.
data.verse: It is better to take refuge in the Lord than to trust in humans.

data.prayer: Father, help the 16,205 believers in Mazowieckie to know your commands and to do them.
data.verse: For Ezra had devoted himself to the study and observance of the Law of the Lord, and to teaching its decrees and laws in Israel.
